00125         public function __construct($server, $username, $password, $database, &$log, $type = 'mysql') {
00126                 if(!$log instanceof MAIN_Logger) {
00127                         return false;
00128                 }
00129 
00130                 if(isset(self::$globalfunctions[$type])) {
00131                         $this->functions =  self::$globalfunctions[$type];
00132                 } elseif(class_exists($classname = "DB_Database_" . ucfirst(strtolower($type)))) {
00133                         return $classname($server, $username, $password, $database, $log);
00134                 } else {
00135                         throw new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::__construct', 'Invalid database type.', $log);
00136                 }
00137 
00138                 $this->conndata  =  array($server, $username, $password);
00139                 $this->dbname    =  $database;
00140                 $this->log       =& $log;
00141 
00142                 // Real connection attempt starts here.
00143                 $this->conn      = false;
00144                 $this->connect();
00145                 if($this->conn instanceof MAIN_Error) {
00146                         throw $this->conn;
00147                 }
00148         }

00156         public function connect() {
00157                 /*
00158                  * Check for existing connection first.
00159                  * If so, close it then continue.
00160                  */
00161                 if(is_resource($this->conn)) {
00162                         $this->close();
00163                 } $this->log->log(MAIN_Logger::INFO, 'DB_Database::connect',
00164                                  'Starting database connection with connection data: ' . strtr(var_export($this->conndata, true), "\n", ''));
00165 
00166                 // Check for connect function and connect to server.
00167                 if(!function_exists($this->functions["connect"])) {
00168                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::connect', 'Connection function does not exist.', $this->log);
00169                 }
00170 
00171                 $retval = call_user_func_array($this->functions["connect"], $this->conndata);
00172 
00173                 // See if connection is valid.
00174                 if($retval === false) {
00175                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::connect', 'Connection failed for unknown reason.', $this->log);
00176                 } else {
00177                         $this->conn = $retval;
00178                 }
00179 
00180                 // Check for database function and select database.
00181                 if(!function_exists($this->functions["db"])) {
00182                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::connect', 'Database selection function does not exist.', $this->log);
00183                 }
00184 
00185                 $retval = call_user_func($this->functions["db"], $this->dbname, $this->conn);
00186 
00187                 // See if selection was successful.
00188                 if(!$retval) {
00189                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::connect', 'Database selection failed (it may not exist).', $this->log);
00190                 }
00191 
00192                 // Get list of tables and load into object.
00193                 $res = $this->query("SHOW TABLES FROM {$this->dbname}");
00194 
00195                 if($res === false) {
00196                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, 'DB_Database::connect', 'Could not retrieve a list of tables.', $this->log);
00197                 }
00198 
00199                 $list = array();
00200                 while($row = $this->result($res)) {
00201                         $list[$row[0]] = false;
00202                 } $this->tables = $list;
00203 
00204                 return true;
00205         }

00213         public function close() {
00214                 // If there is no connection, return.
00215                 $this->log->log(MAIN_Logger::INFO, 'DB_Database::close', 'Closing connection.');
00216                 if(!is_resource($this->conn)) {
00217                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::NOTICE, 'DB_Database::connect', 'Closing connection that never opened.', $this->log);
00218                         return true;
00219                 }
00220 
00221                 // Check for close function and close connection.
00222                 if(!function_exists($this->functions["close"])) {
00223                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::close', 'Function to close connection does not exist.', $this->log);
00224                 }
00225 
00226                 $retval = call_user_func($this->functions["close"], $this->conn);
00227 
00228                 return $retval;
00229         }

00241         public function query($sql) {
00242                 $curtime = gmdate('c');
00243                 $sql = "/* Time: $curtime */ /* DB: {$this->dbname} */ " . $sql;
00244 
00245                 $this->log->log(MAIN_Logger::INFO, 'DB_Database::query', "Making query: $sql");
00246 
00247                 // Check for a connection first.
00248                 if(!is_resource($this->conn)) {
00249                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, 'DB_Database::query', 'Database not connected yet.', $this->log);
00250                 }
00251 
00252                 // Check for query function and submit query.
00253                 if(!function_exists($this->functions["query"])) {
00254                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::query', 'Query function does not exist.', $this->log);
00255                 }
00256 
00257                 $retval = call_user_func($this->functions["query"], $sql, $this->conn);
00258 
00259                 return $retval;
00260         }

00270         public function result($res, $type = "array") {
00271                 // Check for a connection first.
00272                 if(!is_resource($this->conn)) {
00273                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, 'DB_Database::result', 'Database not connected yet.', $this->log);
00274                 }
00275 
00276                 /*
00277                  * Check for function and submit query.
00278                  * The function is taken from the array of database
00279                  * functions, using $type as the key.
00280                  */
00281                 if(!function_exists($this->functions[$type])) {
00282                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::result', 'Result retrieval function does not exist.', $this->log);
00283                 }
00284 
00285                 return call_user_func($this->functions[$type], $res);
00286         }

00295         public function escape($string) {
00296                 // Check for a connection first.
00297                 if(!is_resource($this->conn)) {
00298                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, 'DB_Database::escape', 'Database not connected yet.', $this->log);
00299                 }
00300 
00301                 // Check for escape function and escape string.
00302                 if(!function_exists($this->functions["escape"])) {
00303                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::escape', 'Escape function does not exist.', $this->log);
00304                 }
00305 
00306                 return call_user_func($this->functions["escape"], $string);
00307         }

00319         public function getTable($tablename) {
00320                 $this->log->log(MAIN_Logger::INFO, 'DB_Database::getTable', "Getting table $tablename.");
00321                 if($this->tables[$tablename] instanceof DB_Table) {
00322                         return $this->tables[$tablename];
00323                 } elseif($this->tables[$tablename] === false) {
00324                         $this->tables[$tablename] = new DB_Table($this, $tablename);
00325                         return $this->tables[$tablename];
00326                 } else {
00327                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, 'DB_Database::getTable',
00328                                               "$tablename does not exist.");
00329                 }
00330         }
